name: Color Ball Blast-Cannon Bomber
description:
Blasting Beauty, Color Therapy Shooting game, Color Ball Blast!
Blast the raining color balls, the prettier the better.

[ Fun Blasts like a Cannons with Color Ball Blast ]
- Boost the Blasting FUN with various Color Balls
- Powerful Blasts with pin-point Cannon upgrades, just right on your taste.
- More colors, more sensation. Enjoy a Rainbow Color Ball Blast!
- Extra Levels full of Thrilling Tension!

[ Whenever, Wherever, Enjoy it Easy ]
- Easy Control: A single finger is enough to control your cannon!
- Global Rankings: Enjoy with everyone around the world with the global leaderboard!
- No wifi required: Play wherever you are!

Color Ball Blast-Cannon Bomber Customer Service - colorballblast@help.neowiz.com
